name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior System Engineer with 13+ years of experience in DevOps and Infrastructure as Code, proficient in managing Linux environments and utilizing tools like **Ansible** for automation. Skilled in developing and maintaining cloud architectures on **GCP**, ensuring compliance and security protocols are upheld. Expertise in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines to streamline development workflows and enhance operational efficiency. Strong programming skills in **Python** and experience with systems programming in **Go**.

Demonstrated ability to deploy high-performance applications across various sectors, including healthcare and finance. Adept at integrating predictive analytics and AI/ML capabilities within applications, leveraging tools such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and data orchestration frameworks like **Airflow**. Extensive experience adhering to compliance standards (HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, SOC 2) and a solid background in MLOps with tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**.
